stories.text:
I work for an automotive company (traditional) 
I am a senior manager leading a product development team of 70 and am also technically inclined.w are working on some cutting edge technologies.
My next level is an Executive position.Not much importance for technical career path in this company. For this role, I need to increase my visibility and executive presence. I am facing challenge in this transition. How can I change my perspective in that direction?  Any pointers and inputs can be of great help.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to increase your executive presence
The lost talks from Linus Torvalds at DECUS'94

stories.text:
I saw this on forums and now on social media. People write comments that almost always get ignored or remain unread. On HN, comments that are way down the page have almost no chance of being noticed and replied to by others, and yet people write comments on HN.

Why do you think that is? Do you ever try to "force" attention to your comment by replying to top comments even if your comment is not relevant to the OP?
stories.title: Why do people write comments even if no one reads them?
Terminal interface to search the LLVM-C API
Terra Becomes Second-Largest DeFi Protocol, Surpassing Binance Smart Chain
